author: rcm
msg: Altered the drawing of the tree browser frame so that the resize border appears over the centre line.

author: rcm
msg: Fixed offset scrolling.  Now the thumb is always aligned with the mouse.

author: rcm
msg: Fixed problems with resize border where the border could not be activated when moving the mouse from right to left.

author: rcm
msg: Created an empty border; does no drawing.

author: rcm
msg: In the AbstractBorder methods lick firstClick and mouseMoved where passing on control to thier content even though the mouse was still within the border.  This caused the content to do things that they shouldn't, e.g. clicking outside a scroll border could move the scrollbar.  No these methods return immediately if the mouse is inside the border.
